articles.title: Li Jinglei hit by backlash in Wang Leehom saga; good friend Patty Hou becomes unexpected target - AsiaOne
articles.description: If you thought 2021 marked the end of the Wang Leehom-Li Jinglei divorce saga, think again. Only this time, the tide appears to have turned — in Leehom's favour. According to Taiwan media reports, the "whitewashing" of the Mandopop singer's misdeeds in recent…
articles.content:

articles.title: Don't want to perspire: Jackie Chan laments some young actors want to look good without hard work - AsiaOne
articles.description: A talkshow to commemorate the 40th anniversary of the Golden Rooster Awards recently featured Jackie Chan as a guest. And while he was ecstatic to share some highlights of his long showbiz career, he added that some young actors today no longer believe in har…
